email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan as 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Can you confirm the vessel’s availability for this window? Also, please send over the draft charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and the MV Ocean Star is available for the 15-18 October laycan. I’ll send over the draft charter party by end of day today. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We’ve reviewed the draft charter party, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the agreed terms: $51.00 per metric ton, laycan 15-18 October, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Please confirm final details, and we’ll issue the fixture. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed! The MV Ocean Star is fixed at $51.00 per metric ton, laycan 15-18 October, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. I’ll send the final fixture recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
